automate_with_vagrant.title: Automating Development Environment Setup
automate_with_vagrant.summary: Don't let development environment setup become the feared and dreaded thing in your work process.

impostor_syndrome.title: Who is this idiot?
impostor_syndrome.summary: It's a basic fact of life that real programmers start coding at their early teens, hack in their spare time and are always up to date with bleeding edge technologies. But these great expectations may lead to great burnouts.

plot_in_my_code.title: There's a Plot In My Code
plot_in_my_code.summary: Most compelling aspect of creative writing is that you can create worlds and alter realities using only your mind. It’s the same with writing code and what’s more – I have realized that writing a web application is not so far off from writing a screenplay.
